title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Penthouse in Westwood *Virtual Tour *1 Month Free
posting_body: ['1 Month Free on a 12 Month Lease', 'Virtual Tour Unit# Ph1  <URL>', "With a peaceful setting created by ivy-draped walls, interaction-focused lounge areas and a resort-style pool, you'll be surprised to find edgy features hidden throughout the property.", 'Custom graffiti art walls, cabana lounges and sultry color palettes keep the vibe energetic.', 'eight70 proudly mirrors the multidimensional layers of Westwood Village.', 'Located just seconds from the Botanical Gardens and UCLA Campus, as well as countless restaurants and shops, eight70 offers an outstanding Walk Score of 82.', 'The community is surrounding by a bustling neighborhood, yet set in such a way that a retreat from the busy world is always available.', 'Your new life awaits you, at eight70.', 'Live Video Calls & In-Person Tours Available', 'Amenities Include:', '- Multiple Elevators', '- Air Conditioning', '- Brand New Fitness Center', '- Floor to Ceiling Tile Showers', '- Penthouse Options', '- Custom Graffiti Art Wall', '- Gourmet Appliance Package', '- Plank Flooring Throughout', '- Double Pane Windows', '- Laundry Facilities & Dry Cleaning', '- Conference & Study Room', '- Quartz Countertops & Backsplashes', '- Lush Landscaping', '- Heated Resort-Style Pool', '- Spacious Walk In Closet(s)', '- Outdoor Cabana Lounges', '- Private Balconies and Patios', 'In-Unit Features & Amenities Vary', 'Call:', 'show contact info', '870 Hilgard Avenue Westwood, CA 90024', 'Sq Feet may not be exact.', 'Price & availability are conditional.', '*', 'In certain apartment homes.']
